itunes:subtitle: The guys from Bourbiz stop by to hand-deliver a signed Miami Dolphins Ray Finkle jersey, tell the story of how former Redskins quarterback Dwayne Haskins apparently had no idea who Matthew McConaughey was when he met him at a team event, and what they th...
itunes:summary:
The guys from Bourbiz stop by to hand-deliver a signed Miami Dolphins Ray Finkle jersey, tell the story of how former Redskins quarterback Dwayne Haskins apparently had no idea who Matthew McConaughey was when he met him at a team event, and what they think will happen with military policy once people from their generation become generals.
